  • Field Details

    • menu

      private static ArrayList<MenuItem> menu
      Initialize an arraylist of MenuItem

  • Constructor Details

    • MenuDB

      public MenuDB() throws IOException
      Read in menu from text file when creating a Menu class
      Throws:
      IOException - If an input or output exception occurred.

  • Method Details

    • getFromMenuFile

      public void getFromMenuFile() throws IOException
      Read in MenuItems from text file and store in menu arraylist
      Throws:
      IOException - If an input or output exception occurred.

    • printMenu

      public void printMenu()
      Print all MenuItem that are in the menu arraylist

    • updateMenu

      public void updateMenu() throws IOException
      Update the text file with all menu items in the menu array list. Prints the class name first, followed by the class descriptor then followed by the menu item's details.
      Throws:
      IOException - If an input or output exception occurred.

    • getAllClasses

      public ArrayList<Class<?>> getAllClasses()
      Finds all unique classes that are in the menu arraylist and stores it in an ArrayList.
      Returns:
      ArrayList of classes that are in the menu.

    • addMenuItem

      public void addMenuItem​(MenuItem item)
      Adds an item into the menu arraylist. The item must be a subclass of MenuItem so that it can be upcasted. The item must have a unique name that is different from all MenuItems in the menu arraylist.
      Parameters:
      MenuItem - The MenuItem object that is to be added into the menu arraylist.

    • removeMenuItem

      public void removeMenuItem​(String itemName)
      Remove an item from the menu arraylist if found.
      Parameters:
      itemName - The name of the MenuItem to be removed.

    • searchMenu

      public MenuItem searchMenu​(String itemName)
      Search the menu arraylist for the MenuItem.
      Parameters:
      itemName - The name of the MenuItem to be searched.
      Returns:
      MenuItem that matches the itemName.

    • updateMenuItem

      public void updateMenuItem​(String itemName, int price)
      Search the menu arraylist for the MenuItem.
      Parameters:
      itemName - The name of the MenuItem to be searched.
      price - The new price to be changed to.

    • updateMenuItem

      public void updateMenuItem​(String itemName, String newDescription)
      Search the menu arraylist for the MenuItem.
      Parameters:
      itemName - The name of the MenuItem to be searched.
      newDescription - The new description to be changed to.
